message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS

This paper is about item recommendation, which is a common problem in information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (ML). The paper specifically focuses on the scenario with implicit feedback, which is a common setting in IR. Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a Bayesian optimization criterion and a learning algorithm based on stochastic gradient descent, which are common techniques in ML. Therefore, cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. The paper also experiments with two state-of-the-art recommender models, which are based on matrix factorization and k-nearest neighbors, respectively. Therefore, cs.SI (social and information networks) and cs.DS (data structures and algorithms) are also possible sub-categories.
